Dear {!arcusregserv__RS_Activity__c.arcusregserv__Contact__r.Salutation} {!arcusregserv__RS_Activity__c.arcusregserv__Contact__r.FirstName} {!arcusregserv__RS_Activity__c.arcusregserv__Contact__r.LastName},
Thank you for submitting your {!arcusregserv__RS_Activity__c.arcusregserv__Licence_Record_Type__c} application.
In order for your application to be processed a brief inspection of the property is required. I confirm that an appointment has been made to carry out an inspection on {!Today}. The inspection will take approximately 30 minutes. Please ensure that access to all parts of the property is available.
If you need to contact us about this application please quote ref :{!arcusregserv__RS_Activity__c.arcusregserv__Licence__r.Name}
Yours Sincerely, Housing Enforcement Team Peterborough City Council
